name: CDM135FINALPROJECTSPRING2020
description:
Max's Memory is the final project for CDM135 @ UCDavis, Spring 2020. 

There will be nine characters inside the game. The player needs to find them. The character will present a brief story about that specific space, and sometimes the character will also give the player a hint about the other character's location. 

Sometimes the player may realize that he may pass through some wall, or jump down at a particular location; this is not a bug; it is made like that. The reason is that the players may have various choices to finish the game. 

Last but not least!!! There is a specific instrution telling the player how to exist the game, so, please find that particular location. 
Hint: It might be hard to find, but look carefully.
